Welcome to Rolling Thunder Wasteland by Event Horizon Gaming!
Please report all bugs / issues / comments / suggestions to our website at http://www.eventhorizongaming.net
For more info please see the diary entries at the top left corner of the map screen or visit our website!

Team killing is against the rules!
If this was accidental, apologize and explain yourself or else you will be marked as a teamkiller and kicked to lobby where you will be forced to play on Independent.

1. No cheating / scripting / hacking / exploiting.
2. No intentional team killing / damaging / intentional griefing or stealing of vehicles / assets on BLUFOR or OPFOR.
3. No voice communication on Independent in side chat. We have a public TeamSpeak for players to use at ts.eventhorizongaming.net!
4. No racism.
5. Be respectful towards your fellow players and administrators / moderators.
6. DON'T BE AN IDIOT.
